verbs.description: The Office of Government Ethics ( OGE ) [V: has] sent a letter to the Department of Justice on President Donald Trump ’s hush money payments to adult film star Stormy Daniels , MSNBC chief legal correspondent Ari Melber reports .

[ARG0: The Office of Government Ethics ( OGE )] has [V: sent] [ARG1: a letter] [ARG2: to the Department of Justice] [C-ARG1: on President Donald Trump ’s hush money payments to adult film star Stormy Daniels] , MSNBC chief legal correspondent Ari Melber reports .
